com.isaacloud.sdk

Class Isaacloud

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.isaacloud.sdk.Isaacloud

  • public class Isaacloud
extends java.lang.Object
    Class with convenience methods for connecting with the api.

      • event

        public Response event(long subjectId,
             java.lang.String subjectType,
             java.lang.String priority,
             long sourceId,
             java.lang.String type,
             net.minidev.json.JSONObject body)
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      IsaacloudConnectionException
        Push new event into Queue.
        Parameters:
        subjectId - subject Id, id of resource
        subjectType - GROUP or USER
        priority - PRIORITY_LOW, PRIORITY_MEDIUM, PRIORITY_NORMAL, PRIORITY_HIGH, PRIORITY_CRITICAL, PRIORITY_BLOCKER
        sourceId - transaction source id
        type - NORMAL, GROUP, DEBUG, FORCED
        body - event body
        Returns:
        response with the created event.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - connection problem
        IsaacloudConnectionException - response had an error code
